work.title: Software Engineering Intern (two summers)
work.description: Returned to Rocket to lead a small team of interns in developing comprehensive internal tooling to allow greater insight into company data for testers, developers, and legal auditors. Built a modern Angular/TypeScript frontend leveraging a C# backend to retrieve data from multiple APIs, processing and displaying data for the user quickly and comprehensively. This tool has and will save its users hundreds of person-hours of developing, testing, and auditing.

work.title: Machine Learning - Directed Study under Professor Raj Rao Nadakuditi
work.description: Studied machine learning and its applications in digital signal processing. I Created models to identify the genre of a sample of music, between 10 genres, achieveing high accuracy rates. I experimented with modifying the fourier transform algorithm to eliminate the phase or magnitude of the output signal, and was able to identify the samples with limited information.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: I started my first internship at Savance in high school, learning about their product EIOBoard and answering support tickets. I then developed an integration for EIOBoard with a client's access control system. Savance is a small company with a small team of engineers, and I learned a lot about their product and how they work.
